S.name: Site statistics
S.description: Tools to track the rank of a website in search engines, the number of keywords searched by customers/users, the domain rating, the URL rating, and the number of social media shares.

SC.name: Source code and content analysis
SC.description: Tools to analyze the source code and content of a website.

TA.name: Taffic analysis
TA.description: Tools to analyze the traffic of a website.

CD.name: Crawl data
CD.description: Tools to crawl the data of a website.

BC.name: Backlink analysis
BC.description: Tools to analyze the backlinks of a website.

SL.name: Scholar literature
SL.description: Tools to analyze the scholar literature of a website.

T.name: Technology analysis
T.description: Tools to analyze the technology aspects of a website.

data.description: SEO tools which can be used to perform site audits, rank tracking and overall site research.
Open-source repository of web crawl data.
A service providing backlinks and other statistics on a given domain.
A service able to scrape target website's source code and also technologies used by a domain.
The service allows to search for code, signatures of keywords.
